resources.string: Cannot show events since Read from Calendar Permission was not granted!
Requesting to read from your Calender

In order to show your events we need to read from your Google Calender.
If we do not have access, no events will be shown. Will you allow us to read your events?

Your helper for getting the most out of your time!
We draw your upcoming tasks from Moodle, and combined with events from your Google Calender, and Preferences you set, we create the right schedule for you!

Something went wrong during login,
make sure your credentials are correct

One of the values was filled incorrectly.
Please note, Average time a task takes must be a number, in hours, between 1 and 100.
Preferred study session duration must be a number, in hours, between 1 and Average task time.
Min time between sessions must be a number, in minutes, lower then 1440
